00096 size_t Buffer::SetData(const char *buf, size_t len, unsigned offset)
00097 {
00098   size_t size=datarope.size();
00099 
00100   if ((offset + len) <= size) {
00101     datarope.replace(offset,len,buf,len);
00102   } else if (offset>=size) {
00103     if (offset-size>0) {
00104       datarope.append(offset-size,0);
00105     }
00106     datarope.append(buf,len);
00107   } else {
00108     size_t r1=size-offset;
00109     size_t r2=offset+len-size;
00110     if (r1>0) {
00111       datarope.replace(offset,r1,buf,r1);
00112     }
00113     if (r2>0) {
00114       datarope.append(&(buf[r1]),r2);
00115     }
00116   }
00117   return len;
00118 }

00120 void Buffer::Serialize(const int fd) const
00121 {
00122   int size = GetSize();
00123   char *buf = new char [size];
00124 
00125   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&size,sizeof(size),0,1)!=sizeof(size)) {
00126     throw SerializationException();
00127   }
00128 
00129   GetData(buf,size,0);
00130 
00131   if (writeall(fd,buf,size,0,1)!=size) {
00132     throw SerializationException();
00133   }
00134 
00135   delete [] buf;
00136 }

00138 void Buffer::Unserialize(const int fd)
00139 {
00140   int size;
00141 
00142   if (readall(fd,(char*)&size,sizeof(size))!=sizeof(size)) {
00143     throw SerializationException();
00144   }
00145 
00146   char *buf = new char[size];
00147 
00148   if (readall(fd,buf,size)!=size) {
00149     throw SerializationException();
00150   }
00151 
00152   datarope = std::string(buf,size);
00153 
00154   delete [] buf;
00155

00159 std::ostream & Buffer::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00160 {
00161   size_t size=GetSize();
00162   char hex[2];
00163   unsigned i;
00164 
00165   os<<"Buffer(size="<<size<<", data=";

00167     bytetohexbyte(datarope[i],hex);

00172     char c=datarope[i];
00173     if (c>=32 && c<=126) {

00175     } else {
00176       os<<'.';
